name: Campusboard
description: Campusboard is a location-based social network that helps the 2.4 million university students in the UK find accommodation, trade textbooks and any other unwanted items with each other.

jobs.title: Customer Success Representative (Remote)
jobs.description:
Campusboard.com.au is a booking platform for university accommodation. Due to high-value nature of each sale ($15k - $35k), our Customer Success Team provides individual assistance to every student that wants to book with us, answering any questions about a potential property and ensuring that they complete their booking with us.

Since launch, we've helped 1000's of students from all over the world find their perfect home-away-from-home by providing helpful and transparent advice.

Our business model is commission-based - we get paid when a student books with us, as such customer conversion rate is one of the main KPIs in this role.


The ideal candidate has the following qualities:
Excellent written and verbal skills (native or close to native-level English) - all information must be conveyed as clearly as possible to our customers.
Tech-savvy - we use several online tools from CRM to Internal Dashboards to manage communication with each client. An ideal candidate is comfortable in quickly learning new tools.
Well-organised - during peak season we receive over 50 new booking enquiries from students each day. An ideal candidate can organise the day to deal with their portion of new customers and follow-up with all of their customers from the previous days.

Nice to have, but not required:
1-3 years of Sales or Customer Service experience
Knowledge of Mandarin Chinese is a plus

About the role
With our head office in London, UK, this will be a remote position.
We are looking for candidates between GMT+8  and GMT+13 time zones (anywhere between Singapore and Auckland, NZ).
In your first week, you will undergo full sales training and will begin working closely with the rest of the Customer Success team.
The role will start on a contract from December / January until March, with the potential to transition into full-time.

Compensation:
$35,000 - $50,000 p.a., plus commission ($1k - $10k).

Our benefits include:
Competitive salary with uncapped commission
25 holiday days, plus bank holidays

Why You Should Join
In joining the Campusboard team, you'll become an important part of a small but dedicated team. We strive to provide a sensible working environment that doesn't ask for or encourage habitual overtime and we offer flexibility in schedule.

We believe that high-performing teams include people from different backgrounds and experiences who can challenge each other's assumptions with fresh perspectives. To that end, we actively seek a diverse pool of applicants.

jobs.title: Sales Representative (PropTech)
jobs.description:
Our goal at Campusboard is to help students from all over the world find the right accommodation – without any of the extra hassle.


Since launch we’ve helped 1000’s of students find their perfect home-away-from-home by providing helpful, transparent and unbiased information & advice. We’ve accumulated an impressive portfolio with over 500 properties and 100,000 rooms available to book through our online platform.


Today we’re expanding our core sales team due to increased demand and we’re looking for experienced inside sales reps who are excited about joining a high-growth start-up in early stages.


There is absolutely no cold calling and no KPI’s centred around pointless phone calls, talk time or meetings.


We’re passionate about building a sophisticated sales environment by utilising automation tools and fully leveraging our CRM (Hubspot) and always looking for ways to improve.


What we are looking for:


1-3 years sales experience (e.g. travel, tech, start-up, advertising)
Strong communication skills (written and verbal)
Track record of achieving targets and closing deals
Loves sales
Knowledge of Chinese (Mandarin / Cantonese) is a plus, but not required.


Why You Should Join


In joining the Campusboard team, you’ll become an important part of a small but dedicated team. We strive to provide a sensible working environment that doesn’t ask for or encourage habitual overtime and we offer flexibility in schedule.


We believe that high-performing teams include people from different backgrounds and experiences who can challenge each other’s assumptions with fresh perspectives. To that end, we actively seek a diverse pool of applicants.



Our benefits include:


Competitive Salary with uncapped commission
25 holiday days, plus bank holidays
Team lunches, drinks and cinema days!
Flexible and remote work hours
